title: Smart Data Models - Agri Product Type
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic agricultural product type. This entity is primarily associated with the agricultural vertical and related IoT applications. The AgriProductType includes a hierarchical structure that allows product types to be grouped in a flexible way.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type: It has to be AgriProductType

agroVocConcept.description: Relationship. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the agrovoc term associated with this item

category.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Category of the product. Enum:'fertiliser, cropNutrition, cropProtection, cropVariety, harvestCommodity'.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasAgriProductTypeParent.description: Relationship. Reference to the parent product type i.e. immediately above the entity in the hierarchy.

hasAgriProductTypeChildren.description: Relationship. Reference to child product types i.e. immediately below this entity in the hierarchy

root.description: Property. A logical indicator that this product is the root of an AgriProductType hierarchy. Logical true indicates it is the root.
